props.allowedDates: Sets the allowed dates of the month.
props.hideWeekdays: Hide the days of the week letters.
props.max: Sets the maximum date of the month.
props.min: Sets the minimum date of the month.
props.multiple: Sets the multiple of the month.
props.transition: The transition used when changing months into the future
props.reverseTransition: The transition used when changing months into the past

slots.day: Slot for a day in the month.
